QAPair.Question: What is (are) Urethral discharge culture ?
QAPair.Answer: Urethral discharge culture is a laboratory test done on men and boys. This test is used to identify germs in the urethra that may be causing inflammation of the urethra ( urethritis ). The urethra is the tube that drains urine from the bladder.

QAPair.Question: Who is at risk for Urethral discharge culture? ?
